content: {"name": "Friends Of Douglass Community Center", "alternate_name": "", "description": "- Serves residents of the Colombia district.", "email": "", "url": null, "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "1922 Frederick Douglass Court Southeast", "address_2": null, "city": "Southeast Washington", "state_province": "DC", "postal_code": "20020", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 38.8526233, "longitude": -76.9777627}, "phones": [{"number": "(202) 285-5354", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "22:00"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "22:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "22:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "22:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Wear Facemask"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of address required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Call in advance for services"}]}
